name: .SSI File Extension
type_name: Adobe Dreamweaver Server Side Include File
summary: Learn about .SSI files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An SSI file is a developer file used by Adobe Dreamweaver, a web development application. It contains common information that is shared across multiple webpages. SSI files are often used for including website templates and shared webpage components.

content: In Dreamweaver, SSI files are included using the #include directive.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
